Bash(python -c "
from scripts.stateless_strategy_adapter import StatelessMeanReversionStrategy
from scripts.bias_free_backtest_engine import DataSnapshot
import pandas as pd

# 创建一个简单的策略实例
strategy = StatelessMeanReversionStrategy(lookback_period=10, buy_threshold=-0.05, sell_threshold=0.03)
print(''策略创建成功:'', strategy.name)

# 创建测试数据
test_data = {
    ''000001'': {
        ''close'': 10.0,
        ''volume'': 1000000,
        ''date'': ''2022-01-01''
    }
}

snapshot = DataSnapshot(test_data, ''2022-01-01'')
print(''测试数据创建成功'')

# 测试信号生成
signals = strategy.generate_signals(snapshot)
print(''生成的信号数量:'', len(signals))
print(''信号详情:'', signals)
")
